text: TUC publishes report on sickness absence .In March 2010 , the Trades Union Congress published a report entitled ' The truth about sickness absence ' .The report found that UK workers regularly go to work when ' too ill to do so ' .

text: Marijuana was the illegal drug ( other than alcohol ) that was most likely to be used at school ( figure 17.1 and table 17.1 ) .Use of drugs other than marijuana and stimulants is relatively low at school .With the exception of marijuana , stimulants were used more often than other illegal drugs in the late 1970s and early 1980s , but 12th graders in the 1990s were about as likely to use stimulants at school as other illegal drugs ( figure 17.2 and table 17.1 ) .
